ignored.description: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet AdvanceDirectiveTypeCode urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.2 STATIC 2006-10-17 (CONF:1198-8651).
